segments.advisor_message: Alright, uh, let's get started. Can you tell me your first name and last name?
segments.client_message: Yeah, my name’s, uh, Alex Smith. Just Alex, I don't really use my middle name much. Uh, my full name is Alex Joseph Smith.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Alex. And, um, what's your date of birth?
segments.client_message: I was born, uh, on 15-04-1990, so I’m, uh, 33 now. Pretty neat, huh?

segments.advisor_message: Thanks! And, um, what about your… your email or phone? So we can keep in touch?
segments.client_message: Sure! My email is alex.smith@example.com, and I, um, usually use my mobile, which is uh, 555-1234.
